text: There's a new version of [pytest-cov](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pytest-cov) available. You are currently using **2.3.1**. I have updated it to **2.4.0** These links might come in handy: PyPi | Changelog | Repo ### Changelog > ### 2.4.0 > --- > - Added a "disarm" option: `--no-cov`. It will disable coverage measurements. Contributed by Zoltan Kozma in > `PR135 <https://github.com/pytest-dev/pytest-cov/pull/135>`_. > > **WARNING: Do not put this in your configuration files, it's meant to be an one-off for situations where you want to > disable coverage from command line.** > - Fixed broken exception handling on `.pth` file. See `136 <https://github.com/pytest-dev/pytest-cov/issues/136>`_. _Got merge conflicts? Close this PR and delete the branch. I'll create a new PR for you._ Happy merging! ðŸ¤–
